statements: DELETE FROM SalaryData WHERE industry = 'Tech' AND years_of_experience < 5;
DELETE FROM SalaryData WHERE employee_id = 123 AND industry = 'Tech';
DELETE FROM SalaryData WHERE years_of_experience > 5 AND industry = 'Finance';
DELETE FROM salary_data WHERE employee_id = 101 AND current_salary > 80000;
DELETE FROM job_transitions WHERE new_job_title = 'Project Manager' AND previous_salary < 70000;
DELETE FROM salary_data WHERE current_salary < 50000 AND hire_date < '2021-01-01'
DELETE FROM job_history WHERE job_id = 201 AND employee_id = 101;
DELETE FROM job_transitions WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM job_transitions);
